sentences.en: Beveridge announced his intention of standing for parliament.
sentences.cn: 贝弗里奇宣布他打算竞选议员。

sentences.en: Bob , who had no intention of working, leaned lazily on his spade.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃不想干活, 懒洋洋地倚在铁铲上.

sentences.en: He declared his intention to become the best golfer in the world.
sentences.cn: 他表明自己想要成为世界上最好的高尔夫球选手。

sentences.en: His intention took shape in action.
His original intention was to become a minister.
sentences.cn: 他原先的打算是当牧师.

sentences.en: I have no intention of letting you balls it up.
sentences.cn: 我可不想让你把事情弄得一塌糊涂。

sentences.en: I'm sorry I offended you, but it wasn't my intention.
sentences.cn: 对不起,冒犯你了, 但我绝不是有意的.

sentences.en: If I've hurt your feelings, it was not my original intention.
sentences.cn: 如果我伤害了你的感情, 那不是我的本意.

sentences.en: One former patient has already indicated his intention to sue.
sentences.cn: 一位以前的病人已经表示要提起诉讼。

sentences.en: Originally the intention was to intersperse the historical scenes with modern ones.
sentences.cn: 最初是想用现代景观点缀历史景观。

sentences.en: Our intention is to capitalize the company by any means we can.
sentences.cn: 我们的意图是想方设法出售这个公司以获取奖金。

sentences.en: Our intention was to demolish the rumours that have surrounded him.
sentences.cn: 我们的目的是要彻底击破围绕他的那些谣言。

sentences.en: The author's intention is to keep everyone guessing until the bitter end.
sentences.cn: 这位作家打算把悲惨结局的悬念一直保留到最后。

sentences.en: The bank announced its intention to bid.
sentences.cn: 这家银行宣布了参加竞标的意向。

sentences.en: The president said he had no intention of deploying ground troops.
sentences.cn: 总统称并不打算部署地面部队。

sentences.en: They went into town with the intention of visiting the library.
sentences.cn: 他们进了城，打算参观图书馆。

words.tran_cn: 专心地；一心一意地；心无旁物地

trans.tran_en: a plan or desire to do something
